page.title: 16Wareham,Sandford.
page.content: Sandford is a small residential area. It is divided by the A351.On one side is a new housing estate and on the other a large council estate and a small Middle Class area. A resident who has lived in Sandford for 31 years said sandford has grown by 150% and could never be a close comunity because of the dividing A351. A council house resident thought more playgrounds were needed and as Sandford has grown, the comunity has split further apart. Sandford has expanded into four main sectors rather than just one as many years ago. Residents were not always aware of being in a village community;they always thought of Sandford as their own tightly woven community.
